text: Geoffrey Royce Rojas (born May 11, 1989 on the Bronx) known by his stage name Prince Royce is a Dominican-American bachata singer. Prince Royce - Biografia PlanetRecords He started his career when he signed on with Top Stop Music label. His debut album, Prince Royce, was recorded in 2009 and released in 2010. The album was produced by Sergio George the manager of Top Stop Music. Biography - Sergio George The album became a success peaking at #1 on the Billboard Tropical Albums chart. [http://www.billboard.com/artist/prince- royce/1334955#/charts/tropical-albums Tropical Albums - Week of September 18, 2010 Billboard The lead single from the album, "Stand by Me" is a cover of a song which was originally composed and performed by Ben E. King. The single reached #1 on the Latin Tropical Airplay chart and #8 on the Top Latin Songs chart. Prince Royce - Charts & Awards Allmusic It was announced on September 8, 2010, that his album would become a nominee for a Latin Grammy Award for "Best Contemporary Tropical Album". 11th Annual Latin GRAMMY® Nominations Once Again Reflect a Wide Array of Established and Rising Talent From Across the Latin Music World PR Newswire ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== List of studio albums, with selected chart positions, sales figures, and certifications Title Album details Peak chart positions Sales Certifications US Prince Royce Chart History.
